description.plain:
Isaiah Faber (born March 31, 1999), better known by his stage name Powfu, is a Canadian rapper from Vancouver, British Columbia. The majority of his music contains themes of melancholic heartbreak and somber relationships.

Since releasing his first song, “Pocket Change,” to SoundCloud in February 2017, Powfu has amassed over 1 billion plays throughout all of his platforms. The top charting song being “I Could Never Be Loved” with over 1 million plays to date. He’s even been featured on Ouse ツ’s most popular song, “Lovemark.”

Powfu is known for his somber and lo-fi type music with releases like “Death Bed,” “Breakfast With the Moon,” and “I Could Never Be Loved.”

Powfu has a sister who often helps him with his songs. She is better known as sleep.ing

The top charting song being “I Could Never Be Loved” with over 1 million plays to date. He’s even been featured on Ouse ツ’s most popular song, “Lovemark.”

songs.title: Dead Eyes

description.plain:
Dead Eyes is an R&B rap single produced by Promoting Sounds and features Ouse, alongside Powfu.
It describes the viewpoint of someone struggling to battle the dark feelings of suicide, and breaking up with their loved one. The song has over 81 million streams on Spotify, and 27 million views on YouTube.

songs.embed_content: Read “Dead Eyes” by Powfu on Genius

It describes the viewpoint of someone struggling to battle the dark feelings of suicide, and breaking up with their loved one. The song has over 81 million streams on Spotify, and 27 million views on YouTube.

songs.full_title: Powfu & Ouse ツ - Dead Eyes (Traducción al Español) by Genius Traducciones al Español
songs.title: Powfu & Ouse ツ - Dead Eyes (Traducción al Español)
songs.title_with_featured: Powfu & Ouse ツ - Dead Eyes (Traducción al Español)

translation_songs.title: Powfu & Ouse ツ - Dead Eyes (Traducción al Español)

songs.lyrics:
36 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolDead Eyes Lyrics[Chorus: Ouse & Powfu]
I see, dead eyes on the verge of suicide
I realize it's not alright
I'll find my way to idolize it
In my eyes, I'll reach the sky (Yeah, ayy)

[Verse 1: Powfu]
Runnin' outta breath, I been runnin' outta energy
Tellin' all your friends you don't wanna be a friend of me
You makin' up lies, why am I gettin' all the penalties?
I wanna talk about us without talking to an enemy
I've been broken down, like my food in my stomach
Hatin' these feelings, but act like I love it
I don't wanna cheat, nah, I want fair play
I don't wanna crash, land like an airplane
I want you back but when you act like that
Like a one-sided talk, you don't call me back
Yeah, times were hard and when you left they got harder
My bed got colder and my room got darker
I'm still in love, I know, so are you
Why'd I pray for the rain when our skies were blue
I'm still in love, I know, so are you
Let's talk tonight and we can talk it through
[Chorus: Ouse]
I see, dead eyes on the verge of suicide
I realize it's not alright
I'll find my way to idolize it
In my eyes, I'll reach the sky

[Verse 2: Ouse & Powfu]
Tell me if I'm lost, and all the days it took
I gave it all I had, without a second look
And I need breathing room, if I don't see you soon
I think I'll die inside, I'll blame it all on you
I think I'm gone for good, it happened faster than it should
And now it's upside down, I must've misunderstood
But I still wish you were here, and maybe one day you will
And while I wait for you, I'll pop another pill
Black long sleeve, I can see you're freezing
You know I'll stop your bleeding
Let's not make this hard, let's just hit restart
Messed up badly, how'd this all happen
This world's a mess, so please don't leave us stranded
I'm swimming in the ocean of fear
Back where I started, no closer each year
I think, maybe you'll start to disappear
As I cope with these emotions, I don't wanna get closer

[Chorus: Ouse]
I see, dead eyes on the verge of suicide
I realize it's not alright
I'll find my way to idolize it
In my eyes, I'll reach the sky
Dead eyes on the verge of suicide
I realize it's not alright
I'll find my way to idolize it
In my eyes, I'll reach the skyYou might also like48Embed

songs.full_title: Laying on my porch while we watch the world end. by Powfu (Ft. Rxseboy & Slipfunc)
songs.title: Laying on my porch while we watch the world end.
songs.title_with_featured: Laying on my porch while we watch the world end. (Ft. Rxseboy & Slipfunc)

description.plain:
Powfu: When the world ends i want you to be with me,
with nothing to fear for heaven is near.

Laying on my porch while we watch the world end. will be on all platforms tomorrow morning at some point.  Thank u for the ongoing support. Jesus loves u.

If you enjoyed this song also checkout ‘running through the rain’ and
 ‘Blue Waves’ for a similar vibe.

songs.lyrics:
36 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolLaying on my porch while we watch the world end. Lyrics[Chorus: Powfu]
I can feel the world get farther
Every year the stars get darker
Running out of time, we don't got much left
We can fall in love with our final breath
(On and on, stay with me)
I can feel the world move slower
(Watch the sky patiently)
I can see the trees grow older
(On and on, stay with me)
If you stay with me you can have my warmth
(Watch the sky patiently)
Watch it all end laying on my porch
Watch it all end, just hold on tight (tight)
Wake up in my arms on the other side (side) (Be alright)
Yeah, think of me when you close your eyes
[Bridge: Powfu]
Close your eyes
I know nothing
Something about you

[Verse 1: Powfu]
Feeling like ice, when you touch me I can't move (can't move)
You're the reason why I smile while I'm falling to my doom
When you touch me I can't move (can't move)
You're the reason why I smile while I'm falling to my doom
Watching meteors
But I feel secure
Clouds are pouring rain
But the world's in flames
Buildings falling down
Chaos all around
But with you I'm safe
You're my getaway

[Verse 2: Rxseboy]
2012 was a mess in the end
Felt like a car crash in a Benz
This time it's happening
Last song, I don't think I'll ever rap again
Flashing lights, I hear the sirens
By my side, where you residing
That's fine, yeah
Wanna open my eyes
But I can't tell if I'm still alive, wow
Last year on the Earth was amazing
Final verse for the ones that are waiting
Crossing over, wonder where I'm headed
Hope I'll see you soon when I'm up in heaven, yeah
When I get there
Can we meet up?
Let the light talk
Kick our feet up
Back then I faced every fear
Tried to keep you safe when our end was near
You might also like[Chorus: Powfu]
I can feel the world get farther
Every year the stars get darker
Running out of time, we don't got much left
We can fall in love with our final—
(On and on, stay with me)
I can feel the world move slower
(Watch the sky patiently)
I can see the trees grow older
(On and on, stay with me)
If you stay with me you can have my warmth
(Watch the sky patiently)
Watch it all end laying on my porch
Watch it all end, just hold on tight (tight)
Wake up in my arms on the other side (side) (Be alright)
Yeah, think of me when you close your eyes7Embed

songs.title: ​step into my life

description.plain: The song is a reflection of Powfu’s introvert temperament. It speaks of his  wallflower response towards girls  and his peers in general- he’s not outgoing and kind of don’t know a right way to speak to girls. He directly guide an unnamed girl to step into his life and understand him.

songs.embed_content: Read “​step into my life” by Powfu on Genius

body.plain: The song is a reflection of Powfu’s introvert temperament. It speaks of his  wallflower response towards girls  and his peers in general- he’s not outgoing and kind of don’t know a right way to speak to girls. He directly guide an unnamed girl to step into his life and understand him.

songs.lyrics:
21 Contributors​step into my life Lyrics[Intro: Ollie MN]
Dead, I wish I was dead and cold
I wish I was dead, I wish I was dead and cold
I wish I was...

[Verse 1: Powfu, Powfu & sleep.ing]
Ayy, yes, I thought of things I wanna say but never said it
Searching how to get a girl's attention up on Reddit
Sick of all these worries burying my face side in
Wishin' I could talk without awkward silence
Shit, I'm indecisive, never made my mind up
I say I'm not depressed 'cause isn't everybody kind of?
Hope that I'ma win you over eventually (Eventually)
Wonder if I'll steal the heart of someone better than me
[Chorus: Powfu, Powfu & sleep.ing]
And I don't care for what I've got
'Cause you're the only one I want
But I can't reach what's in my sight (My sight)
Take a step into my life
And I don't care for what I've got (I've got)
'Cause you're the only one I want (I want)
But I can't reach what's in my sight (my sight)
Take a step into my life
Into my life (My life)
Take a step into my life

[Verse 2: Powfu, Powfu & sleep.ing]
Ayy, diving into the weekend, all I do is sleep in
Friends hit me up hardly, all they do is party
How am I supposed to have fun?
If I know that I'll never be the one?
Diving into the night-time, all I do is write rhymes
Flippin' through these pages, nothing ever changes
Show me how to have a good time
'Cause I can never get this shit right

[Chorus: Powfu, Powfu & sleep.ing]
And I don't care for what I've got
'Cause you're the only one I want
But I can't reach what's in my sight (My sight)
Take a step into my life
And I don't care for what I've got (I've got)
'Cause you're the only one I want (I want)
But I can't reach what's in my sight (my sight)
Take a step into my life
You might also like[Outro: Powfu]
Into my life, take a step into my life
I don't care for what I've got
Take a step into my life (Yeah)
Take a step into my life8Embed
